content: It is not uncommon to have feelings for someone who may not reciprocate them, or may not have the same level of investment in a relationship. You may have been attracted to his personality, values, or simply enjoyed spending time with him, and these feelings can lead you to have a desire for a future with him. However, having a successful and healthy relationship requires mutual trust, love, and commitment, and if these are not present, it may be difficult for the relationship to thrive.
